comment: Preds Galloway was the best prof I ever had! Every class was like a party in my mind. Disco party. Fros of intrigue everywhere, strobe lights of insight beaming down and owning you. Feel the unce unce unce of the beat son because Galloway about to drop some straight up knowledge on you!

Mr. Galloway is fair with his tests. As long as you pay attention in class you should be fine. He does have a final project but isnt hard. I liked his class because the student was always involved with the topics he chose. I recommend him. Show up to class and should make an "A".
